Actions.Name: Arkentech Mine
Actions.Description: The Demolitionist places an intangible size 1 summon in a free space in range 3. If any character enters or exits a space on or adjacent to the mine, they must save. On a failed save, the mine explodes for [fray] damage in a blast 1 area effect and inflicts burning. Burning foes are slowed.

Actions.Name: Detonate Mines
Actions.Description: All mines laid by the demolitionist explode as if triggered.
